$interpreted: : While the Insects are attacking...
Hanbei: There's always trouble, every time we come to the East...
Hutchinson: We must be jinxed out here, cursed, hexed...
Sophie: Shh... Something's happening.
Ru-yi: What are they saying?
Hutchinson: ...It's too quiet, I can't hear.
Hanbei: Can't be good, by the looks on their faces.
Sophie: Hey, maybe this is our chance! Listen, everyone...
Anxious Alliance Soldier: B-b-but... Do you really think I can fight? I'm supposed to be watching over...
Crude Alliance Soldier: Quit yer yappin' and get to the front with me! These prisoners don't mean nothin'!
Sophie: Ladies and gentlemen~ Morgan's Marvelous Circus is about to begin~
Crude Alliance Soldier: Hey! What's going on in there! Shut it!
Sophie: With his legendary, one-hundred percent genuine, one-hundred percent gigantic antlers, please welcome the one-and-only...Hutchinson!
Crude Alliance Soldier: I said quiet!
Sophie: The hedgiest hedgehog in the business—Hanbei!
Sophie: And last but not least—You're about to have a whale of a time—
Crude Alliance Soldier: Didn't you hear me back there, you blockheads!
Sophie: Water jets~~
Crude Alliance Soldier: Gwah! What the!?
Sophie: Cost of admission—a smile!
Hanbei: ...Hmph. Idiots.
Sophie: Hurry! Let's get to Tindoiimu before anybody finds us!
Crude Alliance Soldier: You hairless hoodlums...
???: Hey! Look behind you.
Hanbei: Close call... Are you all right?
Sophie: I'm fine... But that voice... Doesn't that sound familiar to you...
Hutchinson: Now you mention it, I have heard it somewhere.
Ru-yi: Some time recently...
???: *sigh*... What a mess...
Hanbei: Hey... Who on earth are you? Show yourself.
???: ...Whatever, we were bound to run into each other sooner or later.
Eidatyr: Long time no see, Sophie.
Sophie: Whaaaat!!! Eidatyr?
Ru-yi: Yeaaah, it's the piratess captain we ran into at the port back when we were looking with Rune for his family~
Sophie: Didn't you say you were gonna help Rune find his family? What are you doing here!?
Eidatyr: Well, let's just say I had a bit too much fun in the East and got myself into a little trouble.
Sophie: Fun... Ah!
Sophie: And Rune? Is he with you? Where are they keeping him?
Eidatyr: The aurora. If I'd known earlier I'd just have pretended not to see it.
Sophie: What's that mean... Don't tell me something's happened to Rune—
Eidatyr: Rune this, Rune that, come on already.
Hanbei: Hey! What kind of attitude is that! You promised to look after Rune, and then you just abandoned him and rocked up here to have some fun?
Eidatyr: So what. He's some kid that always needs somebody watching over him! He chose to face the blizzard by himself!
Sophie: The blizzard...?
Eidatyr: Hell, I'm really making this difficult for myself...
Eidatyr: Basically, if you wanna find Rune, he's still up north. He should still be alive.
Sophie: Should!? Whadd'ya mean!?
Eidatyr: Exactly what I said. Go see for yourselves.
Eidatyr: But you better hurry up if you're gonna. Those guards just now were saying... This place is about to turn into a warzone.

Model.Text: While the Insects are attacking...
There's always trouble, every time we come to the East...
We must be jinxed out here, cursed, hexed...
Shh... Something's happening.
What are they saying?
...It's too quiet, I can't hear.
Can't be good, by the looks on their faces.
Hey, maybe this is our chance! Listen, everyone...
B-b-but... Do you really think I can fight? I'm supposed to be watching over...
Quit yer yappin' and get to the front with me! These prisoners don't mean nothin'!
Ladies and gentlemen~ Morgan's Marvelous Circus is about to begin~
Hey! What's going on in there! Shut it!
With his legendary, one-hundred percent genuine, one-hundred percent gigantic antlers, please welcome the one-and-only...Hutchinson!
I said quiet!
The hedgiest hedgehog in the business—Hanbei!
And last but not least—You're about to have a whale of a time—
Didn't you hear me back there, you blockheads!
Water jets~~
Gwah! What the!?
Cost of admission—a smile!
...Hmph. Idiots.
Hurry! Let's get to Tindoiimu before anybody finds us!
You hairless hoodlums...
Hey! Look behind you.
Close call... Are you all right?
I'm fine... But that voice... Doesn't that sound familiar to you...
Now you mention it, I have heard it somewhere.
Some time recently...
*sigh*... What a mess...
Hey... Who on earth are you? Show yourself.
...Whatever, we were bound to run into each other sooner or later.
Long time no see, Sophie.
Whaaaat!!! Eidatyr?
Yeaaah, it's the piratess captain we ran into at the port back when we were looking with Rune for his family~
Didn't you say you were gonna help Rune find his family? What are you doing here!?
Well, let's just say I had a bit too much fun in the East and got myself into a little trouble.
Fun... Ah!
And Rune? Is he with you? Where are they keeping him?
The aurora. If I'd known earlier I'd just have pretended not to see it.
What's that mean... Don't tell me something's happened to Rune—
Rune this, Rune that, come on already.
Hey! What kind of attitude is that! You promised to look after Rune, and then you just abandoned him and rocked up here to have some fun?
So what. He's some kid that always needs somebody watching over him! He chose to face the blizzard by himself!
The blizzard...?
Hell, I'm really making this difficult for myself...
Basically, if you wanna find Rune, he's still up north. He should still be alive.
Should!? Whadd'ya mean!?
Exactly what I said. Go see for yourselves.
But you better hurry up if you're gonna. Those guards just now were saying... This place is about to turn into a warzone.
